Busy Mom: "If you don't take time to rest, you'll just get more and more tired." Slacker Salesman: "Would you like to slack off with me next time?" Busy Mom: "That might be a good idea!"

column3: Busy Mom: "I haven't been able to find much time to spend with my husband lately..." Office Worker Looking for a Wedding Ring: "I understand that. Office Worker Looking for a Wedding Ring: "Of course! Let's create some wonderful memories together!"

Cheating Music Producer: "Exactly. It's hard to strike a balance." Busy Mom: "Really, both are important."

Math-Loving Grandpa: "If you treat solving problems like a game, kids will enjoy it too." Busy Mom: "That's a great idea! I'll try it!" Math-Loving Grandpa: "Please come and have fun with us!"

Bookworm Kid: "Mom, have you read any books lately?" Busy Mom: "I haven't had much time, so I haven't been able to read much." Bookworm Kid: "I found an interesting book. Let's read it together sometime!" Busy Mom: "That's a great idea! I'll try to make some time." Bookworm Kid: "I promise!"

column2: Office Worker Looking for a Wedding Ring
column3: Bookworm Kid: "Office Worker, what kind of books do you like?" Office Worker Looking for a Wedding Ring: "I like romance novels, I guess." Bookworm Kid: "Me too! Do you have any recommendations for books you've read recently?" Office Worker Looking for a Wedding Ring: "I liked 'Norwegian Wood'." Bookworm Kid: "I've been wondering about that! I'll read it next time."

Bookworm Kid: "Mr. Music Producer, what kind of books do you like?" Cheating Music Producer: "I've been reading business books lately." Bookworm Kid: "Huh, they seem difficult..." Cheating Music Producer: "But they're surprisingly interesting. What kind of books do you like?" Bookworm Kid: "I like adventure stories!" Cheating Music Producer: "That's great, it broadens your horizons."

Bookworm Kid: "Is horse racing interesting?" Horse Racing Blogger: "Yeah, it's fun thinking up strategies for the races!" Bookworm Kid: "I like adventure books. Is horse racing like an adventure too?" Horse Racing Blogger: "Yeah, maybe it's similar in that you have to think up strategies to win." Bookworm Kid: "If that's true, I'm interested now!"

Bookworm Kid: "Hey civil servant, what are you going to do after you retire?" Retiring Civil Servant: "I'm planning to read a lot of books." Bookworm Kid: "I love books too, so let's read together sometime!" Retiring Civil Servant: "That sounds great, we can talk about all kinds of books." Bookworm Kid: "I'm looking forward to it!"

Pop Idol Fanatic: "That's intriguing! What kind of book is it?" Bookworm Kid: "It's called 'Idol Secrets'." Pop Idol Fanatic: "I'll read it next time!"

Bookworm Kid: "I read an interesting book recently!" Curious Young Student: "What book?" Bookworm Kid: "It's a science book, and it's full of experiments!" Curious Young Student: "That sounds really interesting! I'd like to try an experiment with you next time!" Bookworm Kid: "That sounds great, it sounds fun!"

Happy-to-be-Alone Housewife: "I read cookbooks and novels." Bookworm Kid: "I'd like to check out your cookbooks too!"

Girls' Night Out HR Officer: "Next time, I'll invite you too." Bookworm Kid: "I want to have a great time talking about books!"

Health-Conscious Designer: "They're very informative and also useful for cooking." Bookworm Kid: "I want to take care of my health too!"

Bookworm Kid: "What kind of books do you buy online?" Amazon-Addicted Rebel: "Manga, or something that interests me." Bookworm Kid: "Manga is fun too! I like it too!"

Tai Chi Enthusiast: "It's a book about the basics of tai chi and health." Bookworm Kid: "I want to learn more about health, too!"

I want to learn about hair too!" Budget Haircut Evangelist: "You should definitely read one, it'll be helpful."

What does it say about?" Truck Driver with Zero Deliveries: "It's about efficient transportation methods, etc." Bookworm Kid: "I want to learn about efficiency too!"

column2: Dad Who Loves Sushi More Than Kids
column3: Bookworm Kid: "Dad, have you ever read a book about sushi?" Dad Who Loves Sushi More Than Kids: "Of course, it tells you how to make sushi and its history." Bookworm Kid: "That sounds interesting! I love sushi too!" Dad Who Loves Sushi More Than Kids: "Shall we make it together?" Bookworm Kid: "Yeah, I want to!"

I love trains too!" Train Sound Enthusiast: "It's even more fun to learn about the relationship between trains and sound." Bookworm Kid: "I'll read it next time!"

It's so interesting!" Bar-Hopping Office Worker: "That sounds fun. What do you want to be when you grow up?" Curious Young Student: "I want to be a scientist!" Bar-Hopping Office Worker: "I'm rooting for you! Good luck!"

Curious Young Student: "We did a fun experiment at school recently!" Crushy High School Girl: "Wow, what kind of experiment was it?" Curious Young Student: "We made a liquid that changes color! It's like magic!" Crushy High School Girl: "Amazing! I want to try that experiment too!" Curious Young Student: "Let's do it together!" Crushy High School Girl: "Great!"

Slacker Salesman: "When you become an adult, a lot of things become a hassle." Curious Young Student: "In that case, I'd rather do research!" Slacker Salesman: "That's true."

Curious Young Student: "Not yet, but I'm having fun with experiments!" Busy Mom: "I know, but homework is important too." Curious Young Student: "Yeah, I get it!"

column3: Curious Young Student: "What kinds of materials are rings made out of?" Office Worker Looking for a Wedding Ring: "A lot of them are metals and gems. Why are you interested in this?" Curious Young Student: "Because I want to compare different things in experiments!" Office Worker Looking for a Wedding Ring: "That's interesting! I can't wait to become a scientist!"

Bank Clerk Office Worker: "In that case, let's go!"

Bank Clerk Office Worker: "Try talking to him little by little!"

Bank Clerk Office Worker: "If you slack off too much, it'll be a pain later!" Slacker Salesman: "I know that, but..." Bank Clerk Office Worker: "It's important to have a good balance!"

Busy Mom: "Yes, that's why I get up early in the morning." Bank Clerk Office Worker: "That's great! I hope you can make some time for yourself too."

I want to be more creative in how I use my time." Promotion-Loving Office Worker: "Why not recruit some friends on social media and give it a try together!" Busy Mom: "That sounds fun!"

Cosplay Kindergartner: "Hello! What are you doing today?" Baseball Pitching Guru: "Hello! We're talking about pitching techniques." Cosplay Kindergartner: "Do pitchers throw the ball fast like heroes?" Baseball Pitching Guru: "Yes, I want to be strong like a hero!" Cosplay Kindergartner: "I want to be a hero and throw fast too!" Baseball Pitching Guru: "Let's practice together!"

Cosplay Kindergartner: "Hello! What are you doing today?" Budget Haircut Evangelist: "Hello! I'm promoting cheap and quick haircuts." Cosplay Kindergartner: "Are you cutting to get a hero's hairstyle?" Budget Haircut Evangelist: "Yes, we want to provide styles worthy of heroes!" Cosplay Kindergartner: "I want a hero's hairstyle too!" Budget Haircut Evangelist: "Come and visit us!"

Cosplay Kindergartner: "Hello! What are you doing today?" Math-Loving Grandpa: "Hello! I'm working on a math problem." Cosplay Kindergartner: "Does math involve calculating hero powers?" Math-Loving Grandpa: "Yes, it's fun to quantify hero powers!" Cosplay Kindergartner: "Calculate if I can become a hero too!" Math-Loving Grandpa: "Of course, I'll try my best!"

Cosplay Kindergartner: "Hello! What are you doing today?" Truck Driver with Zero Deliveries: "Hello! I don't have anything in particular to carry today." Cosplay Kindergartner: "You don't have anything to carry? Can you carry some hero gear?" Truck Driver with Zero Deliveries: "Yeah, it might be fun to carry some hero gear!" Cosplay Kindergartner: "I want to carry some hero gear too!" Truck Driver with Zero Deliveries: "Then let's find something to carry together!"

column2: Dad Who Loves Sushi More Than Kids
column3: Cosplay Kindergartner: "Hello! What are you doing today?" Dad Who Loves Sushi More Than Kids: "Hello! I'm going to a restaurant today to eat some delicious sushi." Cosplay Kindergartner: "Is sushi something that heroes eat too?" Dad Who Loves Sushi More Than Kids: "Of course, heroes eat delicious food to gain strength!" Cosplay Kindergartner: "I want to be a hero and eat sushi too!" Dad Who Loves Sushi More Than Kids: "Let's go together!"

Cosplay Kindergartner: "Hello! What are you doing today?" Tough Dog-Loving Mom: "Hello! I'm playing with my dog ​​today." Cosplay Kindergartner: "Dogs are like heroes' friends!" Tough Dog-Loving Mom: "Exactly! Dogs are just as reliable as heroes." Cosplay Kindergartner: "I want to be a hero's friend too!" Tough Dog-Loving Mom: "Then let's bring our dog and play together!"

Cosplay Kindergartner: "Hello! What are you doing today?" Train Sound Enthusiast: "Hello! I'm recording train sounds." Cosplay Kindergartner: "Train sounds seem like a hero's specialty!" Train Sound Enthusiast: "Yeah, it's fun to record the sounds of a hero's adventures." Cosplay Kindergartner: "I want to collect hero sounds too!" Train Sound Enthusiast: "Let's record together!"

Cosplay Kindergartner: "Hello! What are you doing today?" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Hello! I'm making deliveries on an electric bike." Cosplay Kindergartner: "Are electric bikes vehicles that heroes use to get around quickly?" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Exactly! Because speed is important." Cosplay Kindergartner: "I want to be a hero and get around fast too!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Then let's go for a ride together!"

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "I've been having a lot of fun speeding around on my electric bike lately!" Bar-Hopping Office Worker: "That's great! Where do you ride?" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Around the park and along the river are great!" Bar-Hopping Office Worker: "I'd love to ride with you next time!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Let's go for a ride!"

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Have you been riding a bike lately? It feels so good to feel the breeze!" Crushy High School Girl: "Actually, I can't ride one yet..." Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Oh really? I'll teach you next time!" Crushy High School Girl: "Really? I'm so happy!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Of course! I'd love to hear about your love life, too."

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Do you refresh yourself by cycling between work?" Slacker Salesman: "Hmm, actually I've been slacking off a bit lately..." Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Then come ride with me!" Slacker Salesman: "That's a great idea!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "It's important to slack off sometimes!"

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Raising children is busy, isn't it?" Busy Mom: "Really! I'm busy every day." Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "It'd be nice to take a break by cycling, even if just for a little while." Busy Mom: "That's true. You have to value your own time every once in a while." Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Okay, I'll play with the kids, so take a break!"

column2: Office Worker Looking for a Wedding Ring
column3: Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "I heard you've been looking for a ring lately. How's that going?" Office Worker Looking for a Wedding Ring: "Yes, I've been looking around a lot!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "What kind of design do you like?" Office Worker Looking for a Wedding Ring: "I'd like something simple, but with a bit of individuality." Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "In that case, let me come and look with you!"

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "How's your music work going lately?" Cheating Music Producer: "It's been busy with a lot of things... but it's fun!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "That's great! But do you have the time?" Cheating Music Producer: "Hmm, it can be a bit tough at times..." Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "That's when it's time to go outside and refresh yourself!"

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Have you been blogging about horse racing lately?" Horse Racing Blogger: "Of course! I'm looking forward to the next race!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "How about cycling to the racetrack?" Horse Racing Blogger: "That sounds fun! Let's go together!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "It'll be great to feel the breeze and watch the horses at the same time!"

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "What are your plans after retirement?" Retiring Civil Servant: "I'd like to go on a trip." Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "How about cycling around Japan?" Retiring Civil Servant: "That sounds fun!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Let's make a plan and make it happen!"

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Who's your favorite idol these days?" Pop Idol Fanatic: "That group is the best right now!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Do you go to live shows by bicycle?" Pop Idol Fanatic: "Of course! If it's close, I'll cycle there!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "I want to go too! Let's cheer them on together!"

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "What kind of books have you been reading lately?" Bookworm Kid: "I like adventure stories, so I read them every day!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Going on an adventure by bicycle is fun!" Bookworm Kid: "I'd like to go somewhere far away by bicycle!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Then let's go on an adventure together!"

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "What are you researching now?" Curious Young Student: "Insect ecology!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Are you going to go observe by bicycle?" Curious Young Student: "Yeah, I want to go to lots of different places!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Okay, I'll drive the bicycle, so come with me!"

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "How's working at a bank?" Bank Clerk Office Worker: "It's busy, but it's rewarding." Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Do you ever refresh yourself by cycling after work?" Bank Clerk Office Worker: "Sometimes, but often I don't have the time." Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Let's go for a ride together! It's a great way to relieve stress!"

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "How's your promotion going lately?" Promotion-Loving Office Worker: "I'm thinking of a new campaign!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "What kind of idea?" Promotion-Loving Office Worker: "I'm planning an event using bicycles!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "I'll help with that!" Promotion-Loving Office Worker: "Really? I'm so happy!"

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Are you enjoying your time alone?" Happy-to-be-Alone Housewife: "Yes, I'm happy to be able to do what I love!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "For example, what do you do?" Happy-to-be-Alone Housewife: "I spend a lot of time reading and doing my hobbies." Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "That's good too! I want to relax on my bike too!"

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Have you had a girls' night out recently?" Girls' Night Out HR Officer: "Of course! We all had a great time." Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "What did you all talk about?" Girls' Night Out HR Officer: "I think we talked a lot about love and complaining about work." Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Let me join next time!"

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "What kind of videos have you been making lately?" Content-Hungry YouTuber: "I've been thinking of some fun challenges!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "How about something bicycle-related?" Content-Hungry YouTuber: "That sounds fun! Let's film together!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Yay! I'm looking forward to it!"

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Do you take care of your health?" Health-Conscious Designer: "Of course! I exercise and pay attention to what I eat." Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Bicycling is good exercise, isn't it?" Health-Conscious Designer: "Yeah, I'm planning to go cycling this weekend!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "I want to join in too!"

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "How's retirement life?" Retired Grandpa: "It's nice to be able to relax." Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "What are your hobbies?" Retired Grandpa: "Lately I've been riding my bike around town." Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "That sounds fun! I'd like to join you!"

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Are you looking forward to sale day?" Discount-Day Chef: "Of course! Getting fresh ingredients is important." Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Do you ride your bike to the market?" Discount-Day Chef: "Yes, it's fun to transport ingredients!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "I'll help out too!"

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "How are classes going at school?" Elementary School Teacher: "I'm having a great time with the kids!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Do you cycle to school?" Elementary School Teacher: "Of course! I love cycling." Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Then let's cycle to school together!"

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "How are you playing lately?" Runny-Nosed Kindergartner: "Yeah, but my nose is running..." Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "That's tough. Let's get Mommy to check on you!" Runny-Nosed Kindergartner: "Yeah, but I want to play on my bike!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Okay, let's take a break and then play on our bikes!"

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Are you going to get your license soon?" Driver's License Student & Cafe Regular: "Yes, I'm working hard!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Where do you want to go once you get it?" Driver's License Student & Cafe Regular: "I want to go to places you can't get to by bicycle!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "That'll be fun!"

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "How were the horse races recently?" Grandpa the Horse Race Gambler: "I'm so happy my predictions were right!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "It would be fun to go to the racetrack by bicycle!" Grandpa the Horse Race Gambler: "That sounds like fun too!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Let's go together!"

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "How do you manage the pedestrian zone?" Guardian of Pedestrian Street: "We're doing our best to make it safe for everyone to enjoy!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Can bicycles pass through?" Guardian of Pedestrian Street: "Yes, they can during certain hours!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "If that's the case, I hope more people will use it!"

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Have you bought anything interesting recently?" Amazon-Addicted Rebel: "Yeah, I ordered an interesting gadget!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "What's it?" Amazon-Addicted Rebel: "It's a smartphone holder for bicycles." Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "That looks useful! I want one too!"

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "I heard you've started practicing Tai Chi?" Tai Chi Enthusiast: "Yes, it's good for your physical and mental health!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "It's also good to combine it with cycling for exercise!" Tai Chi Enthusiast: "That's interesting! Let's try it together!"

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "How's the baseball practice going lately?" Baseball Coach Dad: "The kids are working hard!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "How about we go to the ballpark by bicycle?" Baseball Coach Dad: "That's a great idea!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "I'll go with you to cheer them on!"

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Have you been talking about pitchers lately?" Baseball Pitching Guru: "Of course! That player in particular is getting a lot of attention." Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Do you go to the stadium by bicycle?" Baseball Pitching Guru: "That's nice, but watching the game on TV is still the best!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "I want to watch it with you too!"

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Have you changed your hairstyle recently?" Budget Haircut Evangelist: "Yes, I'm confident in my cutting skills!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Are there many customers who come to the shop by bicycle?" Budget Haircut Evangelist: "I'm glad that the number of customers has been increasing recently!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "I'd like to try it myself!"

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "How's your math studies going lately?" Math-Loving Grandpa: "I'm having fun every day!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Is there a place where I can go to cycle and solve math problems?" Math-Loving Grandpa: "Yes, a quiet park would be nice!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "I'd like to cycle with you too!"

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "How about working as a courier?" Truck Driver with Zero Deliveries: "There hasn't been much work lately..." Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "How about delivering drinks by bicycle?" Truck Driver with Zero Deliveries: "That's a new idea!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Let's try it together!"

column2: Dad Who Loves Sushi More Than Kids
column3: Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "What have you been doing with your kids lately?" Dad Who Loves Sushi More Than Kids: "I often find myself prioritizing sushi over my kids." Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Do you go to sushi restaurants by bicycle?" Dad Who Loves Sushi More Than Kids: "Of course! I'm looking forward to some fresh sushi!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "I want to go with you too!"

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "How's your dog walking these days?" Tough Dog-Loving Mom: "I take my dog ​​for a walk every day by bike!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Biking and walking the dog is the perfect combination!" Tough Dog-Loving Mom: "Yeah! Let's go together!"

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "What kind of train sounds do you like?" Train Sound Enthusiast: "I especially like the sound of trains departing!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "Do you ride your bike to the station?" Train Sound Enthusiast: "Of course! To record the sound." Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "That sounds fun! Let's go together!"

Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "What kind of cosplay have you been doing lately?" Cosplay Kindergartner: "I cosplayed as a hero!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "You can become a hero on a bicycle!" Cosplay Kindergartner: "Yeah! Let's play together!" Speedy E-Bike Drink Delivery Girl: "That sounds fun!"
